It's Nice To Meet You
Tell Me More

Competition Name

There is no denying the fact that the success of an advertisement lies mostly in the headline. The headline should attract the reader and make him read the rest of the advertisement. The headline should be simply catchy and various key points should be embedded when deciding on the headline for the ad. The headline should catch attention of the eye at the first glance. Words in headlines should act as tags for the advertisement.

Requirments:
1. Conversations can be a tricky business. Sometimes, decoding what is said with what is meant is difficult at best.
2. Conversations can be a tricky business. Sometimes, decoding what is said with what is meant is difficult at best.
